casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Pierre Torez-Omar FARRAR. No. 527P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2006. James R. Parish, Fayetteville, for Farrar. R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 634 S.E.2d 253.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of October 2006 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of October 2006."
